Employee Database Java GUI
Project Overview
This is a GUI developed by me in an attempt to learn Java, data structures, algorithms and basics of GUI.
Our main task here was to read in from a csv file and store all entries in the form of an efficient data structure. We used google forms to get data of several of our contacts and pretended that these data were those of employees. Everyone was assigned unique IDs and names were shown in the GUI. Selecting an employee would show all their filled details. Images were also used to make it more realistic. The interface was made more user friendly using a variety of buttons, tabs etc.

Place-Hometown
Time of Work
This was a short project taking about a week during my mid semester break in 2020.
Grasping java fundamentals and a implementing a basic GUI took 2 days. Implementing a data structure in CUI took 3 days including debugging and optimization times. Integrating everything took some more time.
Go Back
Major Challenge: Data Structure Optimization
Resources Used and Skills Learnt
Major Skills learnt was time management and data structures.
It was decided by me not to spend more than a week on this project as this was just a pre-requisite set by me before getting into Android development using Java. A major challenge here was to make the GUI adapt to changing resolutions.
